languages.text: "Ты прав, элантах. Возможно лишь я одна знаю всю правду о случившемся. И некому будет наказать виновного, если я позволю Эклендилю уйти".

traits.locale_text: "Ты прав, элантах. Возможно лишь я одна знаю всю правду ослучившемся. И некому будет накзать виновного, если я позволю Эклендилю уйти".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "You are right, elantach. I may be the only one who knows the whole truth about what happened. And if I let Eklendyl walk free, there will be no one left to punish the guilty."
languages.original_text: "Ты прав, элантах. Возможно лишь я одна знаю всю правду о случившемся. И некому будет наказать виновного, если я позволю Эклендилю уйти".

traits.locale_text: "You are right, elantach. I may be the only one who knows the whole truth about what happened. And if I let Eklendyl walk free, there will be no one around to punish the culprit."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right, elantach. I may be the only one who knows the whole truth about what happened. And if I let Eklendyl walk free, there will be no one around to punish the culprit."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right, elantach. I may be the only one who knows the whole truth about what happened. And if I let Eklendyl walk free, there will be no one left to punish the guilty."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right, elantach. I may be the only one who knows the whole truth about what happened. And if I let Eklendyl walk free, there will be no one left to punish the guilty."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right, elantach. I may be the only one who knows the whole truth about what happened. And if I let Eklendyl walk free, there will be no one left to punish the guilty."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Tienes razón, elantach. Quizá yo sea la única que conoce la verdad sobre lo ocurrido. Y si dejo libre a Eklendyl, no quedará nadie que castigue al culpable».
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. I may be the only one who knows the whole truth about what happened. And if I let Eklendyl walk free, there will be no one left to punish the guilty."

traits.locale_text: «Tienes razón, elantach. Quizá yo sea la única que conoce la verdad sobre lo ocurrido. Y si dejo libre a Eklendyl, no quedará nadie que castigue al culpable».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの言う通りだ、エランタ。起こったことの真実をすべて知っているのは我だけかもしれない。エクレンディルを野放しにすれば、罪を罰する者がいなくなる」
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. I may be the only one who knows the whole truth about what happened. And if I let Eklendyl walk free, there will be no one left to punish the guilty."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの言う通りだ、エランタ。起こったことの真実をすべて知っているのは我だけかもしれない。エクレンディルを野放しにすれば、罪を罰する者がいなくなる」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你说得没错，外界人，我可能是唯一一个知道真相的人。如果我就这么放走了埃克伦迪，那就没人能惩罚罪人了。”
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. I may be the only one who knows the whole truth about what happened. And if I let Eklendyl walk free, there will be no one left to punish the guilty."

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，外界人，我可能是唯一一个知道真相的人。如果我就这么放走了埃克伦迪，那就没人能惩罚罪人了。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez raison, elantach. Je suis peut-être la seule à savoir ce qui s'est véritablement passé. Et si je laisse Eklendyl partir, personne d'autre ne pourra punir les coupables. »
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. I may be the only one who knows the whole truth about what happened. And if I let Eklendyl walk free, there will be no one left to punish the guilty."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison, elantach. Je suis peut-être la seule à savoir ce qui s'est véritablement passé. Et si je laisse Eklendyl partir, personne d'autre ne pourra punir les coupables. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht, Elantach. Vielleicht bin ich die Einzige, die die ganze Wahrheit über das Geschehene kennt. Und wenn ich zulasse, dass Eklendyl frei herumläuft, dann bleibt keiner mehr, der die Schuldigen bestraft."
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. I may be the only one who knows the whole truth about what happened. And if I let Eklendyl walk free, there will be no one left to punish the guilty."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht, Elantach. Vielleicht bin ich die Einzige, die die ganze Wahrheit über das Geschehene kennt. Und wenn ich zulasse, dass Eklendyl frei herumläuft, dann bleibt keiner mehr, der die Schuldigen bestraft."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Haklısın elantach. Olanlara dair tüm hakikati bilen tek kişi ben olabilirim. Eğer ki Eklendyl'in buradan elini kolunu sallayarak gitmesine izin verirsem suçlular cezasız kalacak."
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. I may be the only one who knows the whole truth about what happened. And if I let Eklendyl walk free, there will be no one left to punish the guilty."

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın elantach. Olanlara dair tüm hakikati bilen tek kişi ben olabilirim. Eğer ki Eklendyl'in buradan elini kolunu sallayarak gitmesine izin verirsem hükmünü yerine getirecek kimse olmayacak."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
